ProductInfo.Features:
This unlocked cell phone is compatible with GSM carriers like AT&T; and T-Mobile. Not all carrier features may be supported. It will not work with CDMA carriers like Verizon Wireless, Alltel and Sprint.
Android 4.0-powered smartphone with 1.5 GHz dual-core processor and 4.7-inch HD 720p multi-touch display; 1 GB of RAM
32 GB internal memory; 8-MP camera with Full HD 1080p video capture; Wirelss-N Wi-Fi networking (with optional Mobile Hotspot capabilities)
Ultra-fast 4G connectivity; Next Generation Bluetooth 4.0 connectivity
Music player; Video Player; DLNA capabilities; Full HTML browser (Webkit 5) with Flash 10.1 Support
ProductInfo.Name: HTC One X S720e 32GB GSM Unlocked 4G Phone with Beats Audio, Android 4.0, 8MP Camera, GPS, Wi-Fi, NFC and Bluetooth - Gray
